courseSectionInformation: 1 undergraduate hour. 3 graduate hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 undergraduate hours or 6 graduate hours.
description: Facilitates conscious and reasoned control of the human organism as a psychophysical whole. Helps students recognize habits that constitute their daily activities and discard, through conscious control, those that impede open-minded enquiry and self-reliance. Through one-on-one work with certified teachers and trainees, students will learn to change habitual patterns of coordination. 1 undergraduate hour. 3 graduate hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 8 undergraduate hours or 6 graduate hours.
label: Alexander Technique Practicum
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
